item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: For all you keeners out there, I have redesigned my website using Hugo! For those who don't know me, my name is Samuel Horovatin. I am currently in my final year of Computer Science at the University of Saskatchewan. I have experience in project management, back-end technology, cloud, and API development. In addition I have experience working in C, C#, Rust, and Python. I am passionate about Bioinformatics, Genetics, Ichthyology, and Paleontology.
